sentences.en: China's record as a citizen of the world is threadbare.
sentences.cn: 中国作为世界一员的历史极度乏善可陈.

sentences.en: He had thrummed upon this topic till it is threadbare.
sentences.cn: 他对这个问题一再发言已使它成为陈词滥调.

sentences.en: Life in peacetime Britain was grey threadbare dreary and hopeless.
sentences.cn: 和平时期英国的生活是灰色、乏味、沉闷并且无望的.

sentences.en: Pride may lurk a threadbare cloak.
sentences.cn: 骄傲可能披著老一套的外套出现.

sentences.en: Pride may lurk under a threadbare cloak.
sentences.cn: 骄傲可能会潜藏在穿旧的斗篷下.

sentences.en: She sat cross-legged on a square of threadbare carpet.
sentences.cn: 她盘腿坐在一块破旧的方形地毯上。

sentences.en: Standing on the threadbare carpet runner in hall, my father blinks.
sentences.cn: 我爸爸站在通道里破旧的地毯上,眨着眼.

sentences.en: Such threadbare coats and trousers never were seen in Rag Fair.
sentences.cn: 这样破破烂烂的衣服就是连在旧衣市场也看不到.

sentences.en: Suddenly he felt something inside the lining of the threadbare jacket.
sentences.cn: 突然,他在破旧的外套夹层里感觉到了什么东西.

sentences.en: Talk about getting something had become even too threadbare and ridiculous for him.
sentences.cn: 关于要找事做的那套话,连他自己都觉得乏味可笑.

sentences.en: The carpets had worn rather threadbare.
sentences.cn: 地毯已磨得相当破旧了.

sentences.en: The deposit remains uniform State to prevent imprinted threadbare.
sentences.cn: 使不朱层保留平均状况,制止痕迹发虚、不藏底.

sentences.en: The furniture was threadbare; he'd obviously picked it up for nothing.
sentences.cn: 这件家具很破旧，显然他是白捡来的了。

words.tran_cn: 磨破的；衣衫褴褛的；乏味的；俗套的

trans.tran_cn: （衣服等）穿旧的，（衣料等）磨得很薄的，陈旧的，老一套的
trans.tran_en: clothes,  carpets  etc that are threadbare are very thin and in bad condition because they have been used a lot
